mapper.select: SELECT MENU_ID ,MENU_NM ,UP_MENU_ID ,LEVEL AS MENU_LEVEL ,ROWNUM AS SORT_ORDER ,CASE WHEN LEVEL = 1 THEN 'TOP_MENU' WHEN CONNECT_BY_ISLEAF = 1 THEN 'PROGRAM' ELSE 'SUB_MENU' END AS MENU_TYPE FROM TB_SYS_MENU START WITH UP_MENU_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR MENU_ID = UP_MENU_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY SORT_NO

SELECT MENU_ID ,UP_MENU_ID ,MENU_NM ,MENU_URL ,POPUP_YN ,POPUP_W ,POPUP_H ,STS_CD ,SORT_NO ,MENU_DESC ,REG_ID ,TO_CHAR(REG_DTTM, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') REG_DTTM ,MOD_ID ,TO_CHAR(MOD_DTTM, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') MOD_DTTM FROM TB_SYS_MENU WHERE MENU_ID = #{ID_MENU}
SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(MENU_ID), 0), 10, '0') AS MENU_ID FROM TB_SYS_MENU
